text: This will be a period of introspection for you. It will be a time to contemplate and ponder the bigger questions in life. Now would be the time to embark on a new course of study. Get to be an expert in one specific area, whether for professional advancement or personal growth and enlightenment. Trust your intuition and heed it. It will be your most formidable ally. Emotional ties to what you learn may make it difficult to share what you are learning with others. That's okay. This is your time. When you are ready, pass on what you have learned. It was given to you to be taught to others and people will walk into your life who need to understand those things which you have come to know so well.
